data.title: Travel Distance between Shimla and Kalka
data.meta_description: Shimla, India to Kalka, India distance • How many miles / kilometer from Kalka to Shimla? Travel direction, route map & air travel distance between Kalka and Shimla.
data.text:
Distance Between Shimla and Kalka

Given below is the distance between Kalka, India and Shimla, India. A map showing location of Kalka and Shimla with air travel direction is also provided. Along with Shimla - Kalka distance, you can also find current time & time difference between Kalka and Shimla, lattitude & longitude of both cities and flight duration.

Kalka and Shimla are in the same timezone Asia/Kolkata.

Kalka to Shimla Distance • Map & Travel Direction

Travel direction from Kalka to Shimla is and direction from Shimla to Kalka is

The map below shows the location of Kalka and Shimla. The blue line represents the straight line joining these two place. The distance shown is the straight line or the air travel distance between Shimla and Kalka.

What is the travel distance between Kalka, India and Shimla, India? How many miles is it from Shimla to Kalka. 23 miles / 37.01 km is the flight distance between these two places.
